title: Domain Adaptation in Structural Health Monitoring of Civil Infrastructure: A Systematic Review
summary: This study provides a comprehensive review of domain adaptation (DA) techniques in vibration-based structural health monitoring (SHM). As data-driven models increasingly support the assessment of civil structures, the persistent challenge of transferring knowledge across varying geometries, materials, and environmental conditions remains a major obstacle.
